tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    labor_hours DECIMAL(6, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_History (
    maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Equipment_Details (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(100),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
    install_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE WasteToEnergyEquipment (
  equipment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  installation_date DATE,
  maintenance_interval INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
  maintenance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id UUID,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id UUID,
  next_maintenance_date DATE,
  scheduled_by_user VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    maintenance_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Equipment (
    equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_maintenance_date DATE,
    next_maintenance_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(20),
    technician_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Cost (
    cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    currency VARCHAR(3)
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_Schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    frequency VARCHAR(20),
    start_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Maintenance_History (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    issues_detected TEXT,
    maintenance_notes TEXT
)
